Name: Edge
About the game: About This Game: Control the ball by arrow controls Or A,S,D,W buttons. Control the camera by The space button. you are able to move the camera in 4 direction in 'horizontal'. The aim of the game is to balance the ball & avoid the ball from falling down.. You will see some traps on your way...
